General.Name: Romerike Sparebank
General.Description: Romerike Sparebank provides various banking products and services for private and business customers. It offers accounts; savings and pensions products; and insurance products, such as children, auto, death fall, health, buildings, holiday home, property, income, critical health, disability, UNG, liability, operational agriculture, landlord, cyber, customer's, craft, collective accident, commercial, taxi, trailer, personal, travel, poultry, home, and occupational injuries insurance products. The company also provides construction, corporate, and car loans, as well as mortgages, loans to other vehicles, and small loans and refinancing products. In addition, it offers bank cards, credit, VPPS, mobile and online banking, and other services. The company was formerly known as Lillestrøm Sparebank. Romerike Sparebank was founded in 1887 and is based in Lillestrøm, Norway.

3.Name: Mr. Jorgen  Sigernes
3.Title: Marketing Mang. & Member of Gen. Assembly
